name: Pollution Fighters
description:
The game is about a man trying to save the environment from pollution, by using Y for punching to destroy the engine and the black bomb. The engine and the bomb are pollutants to the environment and getting rid of them will save the environment from smoke which causes air pollution. Here is the link: It is not uploading above.

Playable only on desktop.

https://www.dropbox.com/s/iufguyslc0xuoh2/Mobo%20gam%20jam%28pollution%20fighter...
